test.name: As a user I should be able to set preferred measuring units for multiple devices- Fahrenheit to Celsius independent of the phone’s settings

kw.name: Given : user launches and logs in to the Lumina application
When : user selects "Basement" from "Detector Name" screen
When : user navigates to "Settings Option" screen from the "Water Leak Detector" screen
And : user selects "Temperature Unit" to "Celcius"
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user selects "Temperature Unit" to "Celcius"'. Error Occured - null
